abstract: While watching a sunrise from the highest point in Africa, Patrick Pichette decided it was time to “hit the road” with his wife and find his bliss, he wrote in a goodbye note.
snippet: While watching a sunrise from the highest point in Africa, Patrick Pichette decided it was time to “hit the road” with his wife and find his bliss, he wrote in a goodbye note.
lead_paragraph: Patrick Pichette, Google’s chief financial officer, is retiring to spend more time with his family. Seriously.

headline.main: Google C.F.O. Is Retiring to Spend More Time With Family (No, Really)
headline.print_headline: Google Officer Will Step Down to See the World
